profile.title: Iphrofayili Yomsebenzisi
profile.mustLogin: Kumele ungene ngemvumo kuze ubonelane izilungiselelo.
profile.importFailed: Kwehlulekile kufaka sikhiya (ibhasiwedi ingalungile noma lifayela lonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Kwakhiwe sibhangqwana sesikhiya lesisha futsi kwakhutshelwa sikhiya semphakatsi.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Sikhiya sakho sangasese asikashiyi lelidivayisi. Khisa likhophi lehlomile ngebhasiwedi ukuze usilulame kwenye idivayisi.
profile.themeFreeNotice: UsekuFree — sebenzisa i-Sun/Moon esheshako ngetasi lengetulu. Khulisa (upgrade) kuvule ematimu lamanyenti.
profile.backupDesc: Yakha emabhekhaphu anebhasiwedi etikhiya, bese ululama kwenye idivayisi ukuze uvumelanise.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Cuba uma luhlelo lungagcini kugxilwe kulo
profile.followHint: Indzaba zabo itawubonakala ku-Following uma baphosta ku-Followers (noma ku-Public).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisela tincingo letingenako nemilayeto kufoni lakho noma i-email levumekisiwe. Lokuphuma kungakhombisa inombolo yakho ye-Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetsa umlayeto noma likamelo le-chat kucala kungena sikimu

status.filesNote: Kufika ku-5 emafayela. Kuphela emahoreni 24 ngokuzenzakalela.

auth.headline: Imilayeto lephephile, yelive lonkhe ngekuhunyushwa masinyane
auth.description: Kuvikeleka kwekugcinwa kuya ekugcineni (E2E), kuhunyushwa nge-AI, imilayeto lenyamalalako, nekufona ngelizwi/ividiyo.

feature.privacy: Imfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, lawakho emandla.

auth.desktopTip: Ku-desktop? Skhana ngefoni yakho kutsi utfole luhlelo.
auth.tip: Ungasebentisa i-Chatforia kunoma yiliphi idivayisi — noma ulilode uhlelo lwetfu loluhle kakhulu.
auth.scanHint: Skhana utfole luhlelo noma uvule kubhrawuza.

press.title: Imaphephandzaba
press.boilerplateText: I-Chatforia ingumseshi lophephile lonokuvikeleka kwe-E2E nekutalika ngekushesha, wakhelwe kuncedza tinkhulumo temhlaba lonkhe tibe yimfihlo futsi zibe lula.

careers.title: Imisebenti
careers.intro: Singutikhatsi lencane sakha umseshi wemhlaba lonkhe, lophephile. Uma ukhatsatekile nge-encryption, kufinyeleleka, ne-UX le-hle, siyakujabulela kukuva.
careers.openRoles: Ematfuba avuliwe: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Chatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia ingumseshi wemilwimi leminyenti lona ne-E2E encryption, kuhunyushwa ngekushesha, nekufona nangelizwi/ividiyo. Umgomo wethu ulula: kusita bantfu baxhumane — baphephile, bayimfihlo, futsi bangenelelana tilwimi.
about.howDescription: Imilayeto ivikelwa kudivayisi yakho ngaphambi kokuba iphume. Kuhunyushwa, emabhekhaphu, nekumatanisa tidivayisi kwakhelwe kunciphisa lokubonwa tiseva tetfu.

advertise.title: Yentela Inkhangiso ne-Chatforia
advertise.description: Finyelela kubasebenzisi be-messaging labanakekelako ngetibekelo letihloniphako, letiphephile kubo emakhanda e-brand. Sinemabhanela emadvwala, kubambisana, nema-promo etfu. Labase-Premium abababoni titsatsa.

adsense.withPubId: Njenganyalo sisebentisa Google AdSense. Uma ufuna ukusitfumba nge-Google Ads, sebenzisa i-publisher ID {{pubId}} bese ucela managed placement etimayunithi letingentasi. Kukhishwa ngqo kuyatfolakala — sebenzisa lelifomu.
adsense.noPubId: Njenganyalo sisebentisa Google AdSense. Kukhishwa ngqo kuyatfolakala — sebenzisa lelifomu lelingentasi.

why.highSession: Kuvakasha kaningi nekuchitha sikhatsi esiningi ku-chat UI
why.brandSafe: Ifomethi lephephile kubo emakhanda; kufaka nemkhawulo wemvama
why.deals: Emadili ngqo noma nge-programmatic nge-AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ngiyabonga! Icelonkhe liya endleleni. Sitawuphendvula masinyane.
form.missingRequired: Sicela ugcwalise libito, i-email, nelayini wakho.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvula iklayenti le-email kutfumela isicelo sakho…

upgrade.title: Khulisa
upgrade.subtitle: Vula luhlelo lolulungele wena: susa titsatsa nge-Plus, noma UTFOLA tonkhe timphawu letinamandla nge-Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Kucala Kusebentisa
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umusha ku-Chatforia? Lomhlahlandlela lomfisha utikhombisa lokubalulekile kuze ucale ngokushesha.

alert.text: Lomhlahlandlela utawukhula njengoba setfula timphawu letisha. Uma kukhona lokulahlekile, sitsintse nge

section2.title: 2) Cala imilayeto
section2.item1: Yakha i-DM noma liqembu bese uthumela umlayeto wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebentisa kuhunyushwa masinyane ukuxoxa ngetilwimi leti-100+.
section2.item3: Tama imilayeto lenyamalalako ne-read receipts ku Iphrofayili → Imfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Hamba kakhulu
section3.item2Part1: Hlanganisa tidivayisi letengetiwe bese usetha emabhekhaphu lehlomile ku

account.q: Ngikha kanjani noma ngilulame i-akhawunti yami?
account.a: Landa luhlelo noma sebenzisa i-web, chafata “Yakha i-akhawunti”, uqinisekisa i-email/foni yakho. Kululama, sebenzisa “Ukhohlwe libhasiwedi”.

privacy.a: Yebo. Imilayeto netincingo tivikelwe nge-E2E ngokuzenzakalela. Ngunina wena nomamukeli eningatibona.

translate.a: Vumela “Humusha ngokuzenzakalela” ku Izilungiselelo → Kubonakala & Lulwimi. Sihumushela kudivayisi lapho kusekelwa, noma nge-API lephephile ngemibiko lemincane.

contact.a: Sibhalele ku support@chatforia.com. Faka timfanekiso (screenshots) nenhlobo yeluhlelo lwakho.

contact.title: Sitsintse
contact.errorSend: Kwehlulekile kutfumela. Uyacela ubhale ku support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Lenqubomgomo Yemfihlo ichaza kutsi i-Chatforia (“thina”) siqoqa njani, sisebentisa, futhi sabelana njani ngemininingwane uma usebentisa timphahla netinsita tetfu. Siklama i-Chatforia kunciphisa imininingwane lesiyibonayo.

infoWeCollect.title: Imininingwane lesiyiqoqa
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Loku-diagnostic/tekusebenta njengema-crash logs, lwati lwedivayisi, noma i-analytics lecishe ibe ncane kukhulisa umsebenti.

sharing.title: Kwabelana
sharing.body: Asidayisi idatha yemuntfu. Singabelana lencane nalabo labasitfutelako (baphatsi — push, analytics) ngaphansi kwemkhatselwano lowucondzene.

rights.title: Emalungelo akho
rights.body: Ngokuya ngendzawo yakho (GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ungacela ukufinyelela, kulungisa, kususa, noma kuphuma kwekucubungula lokutsite. Sitsintse: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ukuhlalisa idatha & Kuvikeleka
retention.body: Sigcina lokudzingekako kuphela kusebenta insita futhi sisebentisa kuvikeleka kwemboni. E2E asikwati kuyihumusha kithi.

children.title: Tingane
children.body: I-Chatforia ayenzelwanga bantfwana bangaphansi kwa-13 (noma njengoba umtsetfo wendzawo yakho usho).

changes.title: Kushintja
changes.body: Siyawubeka kubuyeketa lapha bese siyabuyeketa “Usuku lokugcina”.

intro.body: Ngokuvuma kusebentisa i-Chatforia, uyavuma nalamigomo. Uma ungevumi, ungayisebentisi insita.

accounts.title: Ema-akhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nika lwati loluliciniso futsi ugcine tikhiye tiphephile.

acceptableUse.title: Kusetjentiswa lokwamukelekako
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Akunamthetho longekho, budlova, noma lokwephula lilungelo; hhayi spam noma kulimaza okuzenzakalelayo.

yourContent.title: Lokwakho lokufakiwe
yourContent.body: Ugcina emalungelo ku-lokufakiwe kwakho. Usinika emalungelo ladzingekako kusebenta insita (kudlulisela, kugcina, kuhunyushwa).

disclaimer.title: Kuchithwa kwemtfwalo & umtsetfo
disclaimer.body: Insita iniketwa “njengoba injalo” ngaphandle kweziqinisekiso. Kuze kufike lapho kuvunyelwe ngumtsetfo, i-Chatforia ayiphendvuli ngemalimala langaqondzeleki noma lekulandzelako.

changes.title: Kushintja
changes.body: Singabuyeketa lemigomo; kusebenta uchubeka ngemva kwekushintja kusho kuvuma.

doNotSell.title: Ungadayisi Noma Wabelane Ngemininingwane Yami
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayidayisi imininingwane yemuntfu. Kodvwa bahlali base-California bangafaka sicelo ngaphansi kwe-CPRA ngebhathini lengentasi.

cookies.title: Izilungiselelo ze-Cookie
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebentisa ema-cookie lamancane (isb., sesi, kuvikeleka). Asisebentisi ema-cookie etitsatsa letivela kubo belitulu. Phatsa ema-cookie ngekusettings zebhrawuza.
